Performance:
Routine performance. Trying to earn money by playing in public is essentially begging. You can earn 1d10
            cp/day.
Enjoyable performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 1d10 sp/day.

Great performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 3d10 sp/day. In time, you may be invited to join a
            professional troupe and may develop a regional reputation.

Memorable performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 1d6 gp/day. In time, you may come to the attention
            of noble patrons and develop a national reputation.

Extraordinary performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 3d6 gp/day. In time, you may draw attention
            from distant potential patrons, or even from extraplanar beings.
